text: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
The LORD bless thee, and keep thee.
As for me and my house, we will serve the LORD.
Be strong and of a good courage.
The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer.
Create in me a clean heart, O God.
Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
Taste and see that the LORD is good.
The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom.
There is a time for every purpose under the heaven.
They that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength.
Fear thou not; for I am with thee.
The LORD thy God in the midst of thee is mighty.
But thou, Bethlehem Ephratah, though thou be little.
The LORD is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble.
Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth.
Let your light so shine before men.
Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden.
With God all things are possible.
For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost.
Glory to God in the highest.
For nothing shall be impossible with God.
I am the way, the truth, and the life.
The truth shall make you free.
Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you.
Abide in me, and I in you.
Greater love hath no man than this.
The just shall live by faith.
All things work together for good to them that love God.
Be not conformed to this world.
For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life.
God is faithful, by whom ye were called.
Whether therefore ye eat, or drink, do all to the glory of God.
Thanks be unto God, which giveth us the victory.
We walk by faith, not by sight.
My grace is sufficient for thee.
For by grace are ye saved through faith.
Put on the whole armour of God.
He which hath begun a good work in you will perform it.
Rejoice in the Lord alway.
Let your moderation be known unto all men.
Set your affection on things above.
Faithful is he that calleth you.
God hath not given us the spirit of fear.
All scripture is given by inspiration of God.
The LORD is my helper, and I will not fear.
Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.
If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God.
Be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only.
The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous.
Hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you.
God is love.
Perfect love casteth out fear.
Behold, I stand at the door, and knock.
I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end.
The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion.
Commit thy way unto the LORD; trust also in him.
Blessed is the man that trusteth in the LORD.
The joy of the LORD is your strength.
Serve the LORD with gladness.
A soft answer turneth away wrath.
Better is a little with righteousness than great revenues without right.
The LORD shall fight for you, and ye shall hold your peace.
Man shall not live by bread alone.
The LORD thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
Blessed are the peacemakers.
Ask, and it shall be given you.
Watch and pray.
Give, and it shall be given unto you.
My sheep hear my voice.
The love of God is shed abroad in our hearts.
Let all things be done with charity.
Bear ye one another's burdens.
Pray without ceasing.
Surely I come quickly.
The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him.
Delight thyself also in the LORD.
Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee.
Call unto me, and I will answer thee.
It is of the LORD's mercies that we are not consumed.
The LORD is good unto them that wait for him.
Walk humbly with thy God.
The LORD will give grace and glory.
Better is one day in thy courts than a thousand.
He healeth the broken in heart.
Blessed are the pure in heart.
Seek ye first the kingdom of God.
Thy faith hath made thee whole.
Be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
If ye love me, keep my commandments.
The God of hope fill you with all joy and peace.
Let us not be weary in well doing.
Walk in the Spirit.
Be ye kind one to another.
Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith.
